Package teapot.rocket.components.body

Class BodyComponent

java.lang.Object
teapot.rocket.components.Component
teapot.rocket.components.body.BodyComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Physical
Direct Known Subclasses:
BodyTube, Transition
public abstract class BodyComponent extends Component
Represents a body component used in rocket construction.

This abstract class extends Component and serves as a base class for various body components used in rockets.

Subclasses of BodyComponent are expected to implement specific types of body components with unique functionalities.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • BodyComponent

      public BodyComponent(ComponentBase componentBase, LinkedList<InnerComponent> inners) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a body component with the specified base information and inner components.
      Parameters:
      componentBase - The base information of the body component.
      inners - The list of inner components contained within this body component.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If inner components list is empty or null.

  • Method Details

    • calculateMovement

      public Vector calculateMovement()
      Calculates the movement vector of the body component.

      This method iterates over inner components of the body component and accumulates their movement vectors. If an inner component implements the MotorMount interface, its movement vector is added to the total.

      Returns:
      The movement vector representing the overall movement of the body component.

    • getInners

      public LinkedList<InnerComponent> getInners()
      Retrieves the list of inner components contained within this body component.
      Returns:
      The list of inner components.

    • getWidth

      public double getWidth()
      Gets the width of the component.

      This method can be implemented by subclasses to calculate the width of specific component types, for example, considering also the width of the component children.

      This method calculates the maximum width among inner components of the body component.

      Specified by:
      getWidth in interface Physical
      Overrides:
      getWidth in class Component
      Returns:
      The width of the body component based on its inner components.

    • getHeight

      public double getHeight()
      Gets the height of the component.

      This method can be implemented by subclasses to calculate the height of specific component types, for example, considering also the height of the component children.

      This method calculates the maximum height among inner components of the body component.

      Specified by:
      getHeight in interface Physical
      Overrides:
      getHeight in class Component
      Returns:
      The height of the body component based on its inner components.

    • getWeight

      public double getWeight()
      Gets the weight of the component.

      This method can be implemented by subclasses to calculate the weight of specific component types, for example, considering also the weight of the component children.

      This method calculates the total weight of the body component by summing the weights of its inner components and adding its base weight.

      Specified by:
      getWeight in interface Physical
      Overrides:
      getWeight in class Component
      Returns:
      The total weight of the body component.

    • toString

      public String toString()

      Returns a string representation of the body component, including its name and a formatted representation of its inner components.

      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the body component.
